description.english: Temptation Touch Shuriken hits more than 30 targets in a single throw
description.schinese: “诱惑抚摸”手里剑单次命中超过30个目标

description.english: Dimensional Ripper spinning blade hits the same target more than 10 times
description.schinese: “次元撕裂者” 自旋飞刃命中同一个目标超过10次

description.english: The Yingwei 5090 Quantum Blade achieves over 50 kills per single charge
description.schinese: “英伟” 5090 型量子刀单次充能击杀超过50个目标

description.english: Explorer laser drone hits over 50 targets with a single charge
description.schinese: “探险者” 激光无人机单次充能命中超过50个目标

description.english: Guardian Laser Defense Tower can fire over 200 shots per charge
description.schinese: “守护者” 激光防御塔单次充能射击超过200次

description.english: Make a target lose over 1000 health by burning
description.schinese: 使一个目标燃烧损失超过1000点生命值

description.english: Keep a target completely frozen for more than 10 seconds
description.schinese: 使一个目标彻底冻结超过10秒

description.english: Conduct electricity to 20 targets simultaneously
Single instance of Corrosion damage exceeds 150
Superpower Carnival laser emitter accurately attacks more than 10 times while locked on a single target

description.english: Possess weapons with Light Medium Heavy attributes simultaneously when clearing the stage
